channel.title: passwordsafe on Background Process
channel.description: Recent content in passwordsafe on Background Process

item.title: A Golang implementation of PasswordSafe V3, ready for Beta
item.author: tim@backgroundprocess.com (Tim Kuhlman)
item.description: The password database I have been implementing in go is ready for Beta! The DB is implemented using the password safe version 3 database spec. Enough of the features for this are now working that 0.3.0 release is ready for others to test.
